name: Mars Marine (Paul1811)
description:
Completed project as part of the GameDev.tv "Unreal Engine Blueprint Game Developer" course.

Top-down horde shooter, set on Mars. 

Budget space marine with limited weaponry. 

Install instructions

How to play (Windows) :

1. Download game from Itch.io

2. Unzip/extract folder to your machine.

3. Run 'MarsMarine.exe'
